constructor-arg.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.persistent_node ( created_date, name, region_id, instance_type, node_disk, price_type, docker_image, instance_count, schedule_id ) VALUES ( :NODE_CREATED_DATE, :NODE_NAME, :NODE_REGION_ID, :NODE_INSTANCE_TYPE, :NODE_INSTANCE_DISK, :NODE_PRICE_TYPE, :NODE_DOCKER_IMAGE, :NODE_INSTANCE_COUNT, :SCHEDULE_ID)
UPDATE pipeline.persistent_node SET name = :NODE_NAME, instance_count = :NODE_INSTANCE_COUNT, schedule_id = :SCHEDULE_ID WHERE id = :NODE_ID

SELECT n.id AS NODE_ID, n.created_date AS NODE_CREATED_DATE, n.name AS NODE_NAME, n.region_id as NODE_REGION_ID, n.instance_type as NODE_INSTANCE_TYPE, n.node_disk as NODE_INSTANCE_DISK, n.price_type as NODE_PRICE_TYPE, n.docker_image as NODE_DOCKER_IMAGE, n.instance_count as NODE_INSTANCE_COUNT, n.schedule_id as SCHEDULE_ID, s.name as SCHEDULE_NAME, s.created_date as SCHEDULE_CREATED_DATE, e.from_day_of_week, e.from_time, e.to_day_of_week, e.to_time FROM pipeline.persistent_node as n LEFT JOIN pipeline.node_schedule as s ON n.schedule_id = s.id LEFT JOIN pipeline.node_schedule_entry as e ON s.id = e.schedule_id

SELECT n.id AS NODE_ID, n.created_date AS NODE_CREATED_DATE, n.name AS NODE_NAME, n.region_id as NODE_REGION_ID, n.instance_type as NODE_INSTANCE_TYPE, n.node_disk as NODE_INSTANCE_DISK, n.price_type as NODE_PRICE_TYPE, n.docker_image as NODE_DOCKER_IMAGE, n.instance_count as NODE_INSTANCE_COUNT, n.schedule_id as SCHEDULE_ID, s.name as SCHEDULE_NAME, s.created_date as SCHEDULE_CREATED_DATE, e.from_day_of_week, e.from_time, e.to_day_of_week, e.to_time FROM pipeline.persistent_node as n LEFT JOIN pipeline.node_schedule as s ON n.schedule_id = s.id LEFT JOIN pipeline.node_schedule_entry as e ON s.id = e.schedule_id WHERE n.id = ?
